# Leomayn

> Operations and AI consulting for professional services firms. We fix operational workflows first, then scale them with automation and AI. We deliver working systems, transfer capability, and create sustainable leverage.

Leomayn helps organisations between £5M-£50M revenue solve operational problems through process redesign and AI implementation. Founded by Tom Jones (former COO, 18 years operations experience). Based in UK, serving professional services firms.

## Services

- [Four-Phase Framework](/services): Our approach from Diagnose through Define, Deliver, and Support
- [Diagnose](/services/diagnose): Discovery and operational assessment to identify improvement opportunities
- [Define](/services/define): Solution design and workflow blueprints fitted to your constraints
- [Deliver](/services/deliver): Build, test, and deploy working automation with team training
- [Support](/services/support): Applied AI training, system optimisation, and ongoing improvement
